meta.name: Extract Specific Website Data with Form Input, Gemini 2.5 flash and Gmail

parameters.text:
=Your task is to extract the exact information specified by the user.

User‚Äôs extraction request:
"{{ $('Web Scraper form submission').item.json['Data to extract'] }}"

Rules:
1. Extract ONLY the requested information.
2. If multiple matches exist, combine them into a single string separated by commas.
3. Do NOT add explanations or extra text‚Äîoutput only the extracted data.
4. Maintain the original values unless formatting is requested.
5. If no matches are found, return: { "result": "No data found" }.
6. Always return the response in this format:
{
    "result": "extracted value(s)"
}

Here is the source data:
{{ $json.body }}

parameters.subject: =‚úÖ Web Scraping Result for {{ $('Web Scraper form submission').item.json['Source URL'] }}

parameters.content:
## SETUP REQUIRED

Workflow Configurations:
- Update the email recipient in the Gmail node (currently set to template_data_extactor_replace_me@yopmail.com)
- Adjust the JSON schema in the Structured Output Parser if you need different output formats
- Modify the LLM prompt in the Data Extractor LLM Chain based on your specific extraction requirements

Required Credentials:
- Google Gemini API Key (Google PaLM API account)
- Gmail Credential for sending result emails

## üîçExtract Specific Website Data with Form Input, Gemini 2.5 flash and Gmail Delivery

What This Template Does:

- Provides a web form interface for users to submit scraping requests
- Accepts any website URL and custom data extraction requirements
- Fetches HTML content from the specified source URL
- Uses Google Gemini AI to intelligently extract only the requested information
- Processes raw HTML content and returns structured JSON results
- Automatically sends extraction results via Gmail with detailed reporting
- Handles various data types and formats while maintaining original values unless formatting is requested

## üìã WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW

Step 1: üìù Web Scraper Form Submission triggers the workflow when users submit URL and extraction requirements
Step 2: üåê Get HTML from Source URL fetches the complete HTML content from the provided website
Step 3: üîß HTML Extractor processes the raw HTML and extracts the body content for analysis
Step 4: ü§ñ Data Extractor LLM Chain uses Google Gemini AI to analyze content and extract only the specific data requested by the user
Step 5: üìä Structured Output Parser formats the AI response into clean JSON structure with standardized format
Step 6: üìß Gmail Send Result delivers the extraction results via email including:
  - Original source URL
  - Data extraction request details  
  - Clean extracted results
  - Professional formatting with success confirmation

## Data Extractor LLM Chain  
This is where we extract the content based on the user request  

Configuration:  
You can update the prompt and the model here to adjust to your use case.

## Gmail - Send Results  

Configuration:  
Update the target email  
Update the email subject and body
